feature.label: Gemoc MoCC Graphical Concrete Syntax Editors
feature.description: The MoCC Graphical Concrete Syntax Feature provides a graphical edition to express MoC models (extension of CCSL to define automaton). The feature includes sirius design models and related java services.
feature.license: All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0 which accompanies this distribution, and is available at http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html
